translated: The best of victors: in that way, one who realizes that phenomena are not perceived ultimately or conventionally is the best of victors, because one has the manner of being victorious over the four demons, even though one has not yet destroyed the four demons.

original: thog ma nas ni zhi ba'i chos ngo bo nyid med pa la /
analyzed: thog ma nas ni zhi ba'i chos ngo bo nyid med pa la /
translated: From the beginning, the phenomena of peace have no nature.

original: gang gi sems ni rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: gang gi sems ni rang bzhin gyis //
translated: The mind of one who abides naturally

original: gnas pa de ni bden pa mthong //
analyzed: gnas pa de ni bden pa mthong //
translated: sees the truth.

original: zhes pa ni bden pa mthong ba bshad pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni bden pa mthong ba bshad pa ste /
translated: This explains the seeing of the truth.

original: de nas chos rnams thog ma nas zhi zhing gang gi ngo bo nyid med par rtogs te de nyid la sems ri rab bzhin du mi g-yo bar 'gyur na de ni bden pa mthong ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nas chos rnams thog ma nas zhi zhing gang gi ngo bo nyid med par rtogs te de nyid la sems ri rab bzhin du mi g-yo bar 'gyur na de ni bden pa mthong ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Then, having realized that phenomena are primordially peaceful and that they have no nature of their own, the mind becomes as unshakable as Mount Meru. That is called seeing the truth.

original: de dag kyang mdor na thog ma ni 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang mdor na thog ma ni 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o //
translated: In brief, the first of these is endowed with the engaged bodhichitta.

original: bden pa mthong ba zhes pa ni gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems bshad pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba zhes pa ni gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems bshad pa'o //
translated: The seeing of the truth is explained as the bodhichitta of abiding.

original: rgyal pa'i mchog ces pa ni ldang ba'i byang chub kyi sems bstan pa ste de dag kyang mos pas spyod ba'i sa gnyis la gnas pa'i yon tan du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyal pa'i mchog ces pa ni ldang ba'i byang chub kyi sems bstan pa ste de dag kyang mos pas spyod ba'i sa gnyis la gnas pa'i yon tan du shes par bya'o //
translated: The supreme victors is taught as the bodhichitta of arising. These should be understood as the qualities of abiding on the two levels of engagement through belief.

original: 'di bden 'di ni yang dag par //
analyzed: 'di bden 'di ni yang dag par //
translated: This is true, this is correct.

original: zhes pa nas /
analyzed: zhes pa nas /
translated: This is the explanation of the accomplished potentials, from this verse up to:

original: sangs rgyas nyid dang gang gzhan no //üîΩzhes ba'i bar gyis grub pa'i rigs rnams bshad pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid dang gang gzhan no // zhes ba'i bar gyis grub pa'i rigs rnams bshad pa ste /
translated: Buddhahood and what is other.

original: 'di bden 'di ni yang dag pa //
analyzed: 'di bden 'di ni yang dag pa //
translated: This is true, this is correct.

original: de bzhin du ni mi slu ba //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni mi slu ba //
translated: In the same way, it is not deceptive.

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas bden gzigs pa //üîΩde bzhin sngon ni ngas ma mthong //
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas bden gzigs pa // de bzhin sngon ni ngas ma mthong //
translated: Just as the Buddhas have seen the truth,

original: zhes pa ni /üîΩ'di ni byang chub sems thob pa //
analyzed: zhes pa ni / 'di ni byang chub sems thob pa //
translated: In the same way, I have not seen it before.

original: zhes pa ni de nyid kyi rjes su bsngags pa'i khyad par te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni de nyid kyi rjes su bsngags pa'i khyad par te /
translated: This is the praise of the special qualities of the thought of enlightenment.

original: gang yang byang chub kyi sems thob pa de ni bden zhing yang dag pa mi slu ba ste ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang / ngas kyang yang dag mis slu ba yin par mthong ngo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang byang chub kyi sems thob pa de ni bden zhing yang dag pa mi slu ba ste ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang / ngas kyang yang dag mis slu ba yin par mthong ngo zhes pa'o //
translated: The thought of enlightenment is true, real, and not deceptive, just as the former Buddhas and I have seen it to be true and not deceptive.

original: gang gis byang chub kyi sems thob pa yang bsgrubs nas /
analyzed: gang gis byang chub kyi sems thob pa yang bsgrubs nas /
translated: Having accomplished the thought of enlightenment,

original: de srid du byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'am /
analyzed: de srid du byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'am /
translated: For so long, the Bodhisattva Samantabhadra,

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal lam /
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal lam /
translated: or the noble Manjusri,

original: rdo rje 'dzin chen po gang yang rung ba cig 'ongs te mgo la nyug gam legs so zhes zer gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin chen po gang yang rung ba cig 'ongs te mgo la nyug gam legs so zhes zer gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
translated: or the Great Vajra-Holder, will come and touch the head or say Excellent!

original: de nas phyag byas te mchod yon phul na byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro zhes gong du bshad pa de lta bu'i grub pa thob pa ni byang chub kyi sems @60a * //
analyzed: de nas phyag byas te mchod yon phul na byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro zhes gong du bshad pa de lta bu'i grub pa thob pa ni byang chub kyi sems @60a * //
translated: Then, having made prostrations and offered a welcoming drink, one attains the meditative absorption of not forgetting the mind of enlightenment.

original: thob pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: thob pa zhes bya ste /
translated: The attainment of such a state of perfection is called ‚Äúattaining the mind of enlightenment.‚Äù

original: de lta bu grub pa na de nyid dngos grub yin gyis /
analyzed: de lta bu grub pa na de nyid dngos grub yin gyis /
translated: When one has such a state of perfection, that itself is the spiritual attainment;

original: gzhan ci zhig dgos te byang chub kyi sems de grub pa gzhan gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan ci zhig dgos te byang chub kyi sems de grub pa gzhan gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: what else is needed? Because that mind of enlightenment is the cause of other spiritual attainments.

original: de las gzhan du'ang dngos grub ni //
analyzed: de las gzhan du'ang dngos grub ni //
translated: Spiritual attainments are also

original: rnam pa dag ni lngar 'dod de //
analyzed: rnam pa dag ni lngar 'dod de //
translated: held to be of five kinds.

original: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems grub pa de las gzhan pa ming gis smos pa lnga po la bya ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems grub pa de las gzhan pa ming gis smos pa lnga po la bya ste /
translated: This refers to the five kinds of spiritual attainments that are mentioned by name, other than the attainment of the mind of enlightenment.

original: de dag kyang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de dag kyang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: They are the following: engaging in conduct, and so forth.

original: de la spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa las 'phar te ye shes kyis la 'jug pa'i skabs su snang ba thob pa dang snang ba mched pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par grub pa'o //
analyzed: de la spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa las 'phar te ye shes kyis la 'jug pa'i skabs su snang ba thob pa dang snang ba mched pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par grub pa'o //
translated: The attainment of the practice is the attainment of the special samadhis called attainment of appearance and increase of appearance and so forth, when one has risen from the stage of devoted conduct and is entering the stage of wisdom.

original: de bzhin sa ni gnon pa dang // zhes pa nis rab tu dga' ba thob pa las grub pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin sa ni gnon pa dang // zhes pa nis rab tu dga' ba thob pa las grub pa'o //
translated: The attainment of the stage is the attainment of the stage of Very Joyful.

original: 'jig rten mngon shes lngar 'dod dang // zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi mngon par shes pa lnga grub pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten mngon shes lngar 'dod dang // zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi mngon par shes pa lnga grub pa'o //
translated: The attainment of the five higher perceptions of the world is the attainment of the five higher perceptions of the world.

original: sangs rgyas nyid dang zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su gyur pa'i rig 'dzin grub pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid dang zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su gyur pa'i rig 'dzin grub pa'o //
translated: The attainment of buddhahood is the attainment of the vidyadhara who has become the form of a buddha.

original: gang zhan zhes pa ni rig 'dzin pa la rnams grub pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhan zhes pa ni rig 'dzin pa la rnams grub pa ste /
translated: The attainment of the vidyadharas is the attainment of the vidyadharas.

original: de nyid kyi gzungs kyi grub pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi gzungs kyi grub pa'o //
translated: That itself is the attainment of the dharani.

original: gong ma gsum ni sems kyi grub par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gong ma gsum ni sems kyi grub par shes par bya'o //
translated: The three above should be understood as the attainment of mind.üîΩThe attainment of the tantra is the attainment of the tantra.

original: rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa yi //üîΩzhes pa nas /
analyzed: rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa yi //üîΩzhes pa nas /
translated: The attainment of the lineage is the attainment of the lineage.

original: yid las yang dag 'byung ba thob //
analyzed: yid las yang dag 'byung ba thob //
translated: One attains the perfect emergence from the mind.

original: ces pa'i bar gyis grub pa'i dus bshad de /
analyzed: ces pa'i bar gyis grub pa'i dus bshad de /
translated: This explains the time of accomplishment.

original: de las grub pa'i dus kyang tshe 'di la grub pa dang tshe phyi ma la grub pa rnam pa gnyis so //üîΩrgyud las rgyud du gyur pa yi //
analyzed: de las grub pa'i dus kyang tshe 'di la grub pa dang tshe phyi ma la grub pa rnam pa gnyis so // rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa yi //
translated: The time of accomplishment is also of two kinds: accomplishment in this life and accomplishment in a future life.üîΩThe karma that has become a continuum from the continuum

original: las ni mi srid pa nyams shing //
analyzed: las ni mi srid pa nyams shing //
translated: is not possible to exhaust,

original: rnam smin rnam par ma smin te //
analyzed: rnam smin rnam par ma smin te //
translated: and the ripening is not fully ripened,

original: dngos grub dag gis dus su 'dod //
analyzed: dngos grub dag gis dus su 'dod //
translated: but is asserted at the time of spiritual powers.

original: ces pa ni tshe 'di la grub pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa ni tshe 'di la grub pa ste /
translated: This is accomplishment in this life.

original: rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa'i las rnams ma zad de tshe snga ma'i rgyud go drug la sogs pa nas las bsags pa tshe 'di'i rgyud la ma nyams shing bdag gi phung po gson na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa'i las rnams ma zad de tshe snga ma'i rgyud go drug la sogs pa nas las bsags pa tshe 'di'i rgyud la ma nyams shing bdag gi phung po gson na zhes pa'o //
translated: The karma that has become a continuum from the continuum is not exhausted. The karma accumulated in the continuum of previous lives, such as the six existences, is not impaired in the continuum of this life.

original: rnam smin rnam par smin pa de //
analyzed: rnam smin rnam par smin pa de //
translated: The ripening is not fully ripened.

original: zhes ston la de ltar yang gson la tshe dang bsod nams la sogs pa'i rgyud bsags pa'i 'bras bu yang 'dir smin par gyur cing snga ma'i las rnams ma zad pas bdag tshe ring ba'i rnam smin rnam par smin pas bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyud mthu brtasüîΩbar gyur te /
analyzed: zhes ston la de ltar yang gson la tshe dang bsod nams la sogs pa'i rgyud bsags pa'i 'bras bu yang 'dir smin par gyur cing snga ma'i las rnams ma zad pas bdag tshe ring ba'i rnam smin rnam par smin pas bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyud mthu brtas bar gyur te /
translated: Thus, the result of the accumulation of the continuum of life, merit, and so on is also ripened here, and since the former actions are not exhausted, the maturation of my long life is fully ripened, and the continuum of my merit is stabilized.

original: sgrub pa'i tshe de ltar tshe dang bsod nams gnyis bsrungs na de tshe 'di nyid la grub par bshad do //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i tshe de ltar tshe dang bsod nams gnyis bsrungs na de tshe 'di nyid la grub par bshad do //
translated: Thus, when the life and merit are protected in this way during the practice, it is explained that one will be successful in this very lifetime.

original: mdor na @60b gang tshe dus gcig tu //
analyzed: mdor na @60b gang tshe dus gcig tu //
translated: In brief, when the time is right,

original: las dang skye ba 'phang gyur pa //
analyzed: las dang skye ba 'phang gyur pa //
translated: the practitioner should choose the day

original: de tshe 'ang sngags pas dngos grub ni //
analyzed: de tshe 'ang sngags pas dngos grub ni //
translated: and then attain the spiritual power

original: yid las yang dag 'byung ba thob //
analyzed: yid las yang dag 'byung ba thob //
translated: that arises from the mind.

original: ces pa ni dngos grub bsgrub pa ni las dang tshes ma btang ste /
analyzed: ces pa ni dngos grub bsgrub pa ni las dang tshes ma btang ste /
translated: This means that the practice of spiritual powers should not be abandoned.

original: dus gcig tu las dang tshe zad par gyur na sgrub pa'i 'bras bu sngags pa des tshe phyi ma la bsgrub mi dgos par rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs su skye pa dang rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i skye ba thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dus gcig tu las dang tshe zad par gyur na sgrub pa'i 'bras bu sngags pa des tshe phyi ma la bsgrub mi dgos par rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs su skye pa dang rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i skye ba thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: If the karma and the life span are exhausted at the same time, then the result of the practice is that the mantrin is born in the family of the vajra and so forth, and attains birth as a knowledge-holder and so forth, without needing to practice in a future life.

original: yid las yang dag 'byung ba yis //
analyzed: yid las yang dag 'byung ba yis //
translated: From the mind, perfectly arisen,

original: zhes pa ni rdzas la sogs pas bsgrub mi dgos par tshe 'phos ma thag tu yid nyid kyis grub pa de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni rdzas la sogs pas bsgrub mi dgos par tshe 'phos ma thag tu yid nyid kyis grub pa de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: without needing to practice with substances and so forth, they attain those as soon as they transfer their life, by the mind alone.

original: grub nas mkha' la 'gro ba ni //
analyzed: grub nas mkha' la 'gro ba ni //
translated: Having accomplished, traveling in the sky,

original: zhes pa nas /
analyzed: zhes pa nas /
translated: up to

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga' //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga' //
translated: delighting together with the perfect Buddha,

original: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni grub pa'i 'bras bu rnams dris pa'i lan bshad pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni grub pa'i 'bras bu rnams dris pa'i lan bshad pa ste /
translated: this explains the answer to the question about the results of accomplishment.

original: grub nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba ni /
analyzed: grub nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba ni /
translated: Having accomplished, traveling in the sky,

original: ji ltar sgyu ma 'jigs med bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar sgyu ma 'jigs med bzhin //
translated: like an illusion, fearless,

original: sngags kyi dra bas rmongs byed pa //
analyzed: sngags kyi dra bas rmongs byed pa //
translated: the net of mantra, bewildering,

original: ji ltar mig 'phrul chen po bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar mig 'phrul chen po bzhin //
translated: like a great magic trick,

original: zhes pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i grub pa bshad pa ste /üîΩji ltar mig 'phrul gzhan nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs byed ba bzhin du sngags pa de yang rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang sngags kyi mthus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa la sogs par ston par
analyzed: zhes pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i grub pa bshad pa ste / ji ltar mig 'phrul gzhan nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs byed ba bzhin du sngags pa de yang rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang sngags kyi mthus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa la sogs par ston par
translated: This explains the accomplishment of going in space.

original: byed ces pa'o //
analyzed: byed ces pa'o //
translated: Just as a magician goes in space and performs various magical feats, so also the mantrin, having accomplished the state of a knowledge-holder and so forth, goes in space and displays various emanations and so forth by the power of mantra.

original: gang la lus dang ngag med par //
analyzed: gang la lus dang ngag med par //
translated: Where there is no body or speech,

original: dri za'i grong khyer de bzhin te //
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer de bzhin te //
translated: like the city of the gandharvas,

original: de bzhin mi snang 'gyur zhes bya //
analyzed: de bzhin mi snang 'gyur zhes bya //
translated: so it is said to become invisible.

original: de ni de na gnas pa yin //
analyzed: de ni de na gnas pa yin //
translated: That is the state of abiding there.

original: zhes pa ni rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub nas mi snang bar gyur pa'i dpe dri za'i grong khyer las blangs nas bshad pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub nas mi snang bar gyur pa'i dpe dri za'i grong khyer las blangs nas bshad pa ste /
translated: This explains the analogy of becoming invisible after accomplishing the state of a knowledge-holder and so forth, taking the example of the city of the gandharvas.

original: ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer lus la sogs pa dang dngos su mi snang la gnas par byed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer lus la sogs pa dang dngos su mi snang la gnas par byed pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the city of the gandharvas does not actually appear as a body and so forth, yet it is made to abide,

original: sngags pa de yang grub nas lus kyang mi snang la tshig tu brjod pa yang mi thos par nam mkha' la mi snang bar gyur cing bar snang la gnas par byed do zhes bshad do //
analyzed: sngags pa de yang grub nas lus kyang mi snang la tshig tu brjod pa yang mi thos par nam mkha' la mi snang bar gyur cing bar snang la gnas par byed do zhes bshad do //
translated: And that mantra practitioner, having become accomplished, also makes his body invisible, and without hearing his spoken words, he becomes invisible in the sky and abides in space.

original: ji ltar nyal ba'i rmi lam na //
analyzed: ji ltar nyal ba'i rmi lam na //
translated: Just as in a dream while sleeping

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su ni //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su ni //
translated: in the realm of the Thirty-three,

original: lus kyang spangs pa ma yin la //
analyzed: lus kyang spangs pa ma yin la //
translated: the body is not abandoned

original: de nyid kyis kyang de ma song //
analyzed: de nyid kyis kyang de ma song //
translated: and he does not go there.

original: de bzhin rnal 'byor gnyid kyis kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin rnal 'byor gnyid kyis kyang //
translated: In the same way, the yogi,üîΩthe mantra practitioner abiding in mantra,

original: sngags pa sngags la gnas pa dang // bsod nams byas pa'i las rnams kyis //üîΩ'ja' dang 'dra ba'i @61a * //
analyzed: sngags pa sngags la gnas pa dang // bsod nams byas pa'i las rnams kyis // 'ja' dang 'dra ba'i @61a * //
translated: through the karma of meritorious deeds,

original: lus kyang thob //
analyzed: lus kyang thob //
translated: obtains a rainbow-like body.

original: ces pa ni sngags pa rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub nas lus 'di yang mi 'dor bar nam mkha' la sogs pa la 'gro ba'i dpe rmi lam las blangs nas bshad pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa ni sngags pa rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub nas lus 'di yang mi 'dor bar nam mkha' la sogs pa la 'gro ba'i dpe rmi lam las blangs nas bshad pa ste /
translated: This explains the analogy of the mantra practitioner, the knowledge-holder, and so on, having become accomplished, not abandoning this body, and going to the sky and so on, taking it from a dream.

original: ji ltar skyes bu nyal ba'i rmi lam na sum cu rtsa gsum la sogs pa'i gnas mthong bar yang 'gyur ba de bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar skyes bu nyal ba'i rmi lam na sum cu rtsa gsum la sogs pa'i gnas mthong bar yang 'gyur ba de bzhin du //
translated: Just as a person sleeping in a dream sees the heaven of the Thirty-three and so forth,

original: sngags pa de yang rnal 'byor gyi dbang gis lus 'di ni ma bor bar nam mkha' la sogs par 'gro ba yang rang gis mthong ngo //
analyzed: sngags pa de yang rnal 'byor gyi dbang gis lus 'di ni ma bor bar nam mkha' la sogs par 'gro ba yang rang gis mthong ngo //
translated: so the mantra practitioner, by the power of yoga, sees himself going to space and so forth without leaving this body.

original: gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yang ston nus par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yang ston nus par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
translated: He is able to display various forms.

original: 'ja' dang 'dra ba'i lus kyang thob //
analyzed: 'ja' dang 'dra ba'i lus kyang thob //
translated: He also attains a body like a rainbow.

original: ces pa ni gzugs sna tshogs ston pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni gzugs sna tshogs ston pa'o //
translated: This is displaying various forms.

original: lus dang ngag yid las byung ba'i //
analyzed: lus dang ngag yid las byung ba'i //
translated: Arisen from body, speech, and mind,

original: gsang sngags yid bzhin nor bu 'dra //
analyzed: gsang sngags yid bzhin nor bu 'dra //
translated: mantra is like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: de las rnam par bsams pa'i don //
analyzed: de las rnam par bsams pa'i don //
translated: From it, the intended meaning is contemplated,

original: ma brtags par yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ma brtags par yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: arising even without examination.

original: zhes pa ni sngags kyi grub pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu las dpe blangs nas bshad ba ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni sngags kyi grub pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu las dpe blangs nas bshad ba ste /

translated: This explains the ten virtuous actions of the bodhisattva training endowed with method.

original: de la gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi bslab pa thun mong ma yin pa dam tshig gi mtshan nyid ni sngar bshad zin te /

translated: There, the uncommon training of the bodhisattvas who practice the conduct of awakening through the gateway of mantra has already been explained as the characteristics of samaya.

original: 'dir ni pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang sngags la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyis ka'i spyi'i bslab pa tha pas dang ldan pa bshad par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang sngags la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyis ka'i spyi'i bslab pa tha pas dang ldan pa bshad par shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, it should be understood that the general training of both the bodhisattvas who practice the perfections and the bodhisattvas who practice mantra is explained.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa de bzhin @86b nyid gyi byang chub de khong du chud par 'dod pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa la ni byang chub sems dpa' zhas bya'o //
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa de bzhin @86b nyid gyi byang chub de khong du chud par 'dod pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa la ni byang chub sems dpa' zhas bya'o //
translated: The term bodhisattva refers to one who is endowed with the intention to comprehend the enlightenment of reality.

original: sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes te /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes te /
translated: The term great being refers to one who knows all phenomena to be like illusions.

original: gang yang dngos po yod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang yang dngos po yod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: There are no existent things at all,

original: 'on kyang kun rdzob tu rgyu dang 'bras bu nges pa'i tshul gyis kun rdzob nyid du don byed pa sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas sems can yongs su bsgral ba'i phyir thabs dang bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob pa ni sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang kun rdzob tu rgyu dang 'bras bu nges pa'i tshul gyis kun rdzob nyid du don byed pa sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas sems can yongs su bsgral ba'i phyir thabs dang bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob pa ni sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: but still, in terms of the relative, one realizes that illusions perform functions in terms of the way of the certainty of cause and effect. Having realized this, one trains in the precepts together with the methods in order to liberate sentient beings. This is called the great being.

original: skabs 'dir yang bslab pa de lta bu la sogs pa bshad pa la dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams khyad par du smos /
analyzed: skabs 'dir yang bslab pa de lta bu la sogs pa bshad pa la dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams khyad par du smos /
translated: In this context, the bodhisattvas are praised as being especially exalted because they are considered to be training in such precepts and so forth.

original: bslab pa bzhi zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i dge ba bcu'i tshul la 'jug pa dang / mi dge ba bcu las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid la bya'o //

translated: Then the Blessed One, looking with his eyes of great love and great compassion upon the realms of sentient beings, spoke to the bodhisattva VajrapƒÅ·πái. This is to explain in detail each of the bodhisattva trainings that were mentioned above merely by name.

translated: The compassion and mercy of the Lord are his eyes, because he sees with them who is fit to be placed in happiness and who is fit to be freed from suffering.

original: skabs gzhan du gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes zhes smos la /
analyzed: skabs gzhan du gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes zhes smos la /

original: de la byang chub sems dpas ched du bsams te srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bya'o zhes pa ni 'dul ba la sogs pa'i gzhung las ji skad du grags pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid spang bar bya ste /

translated: The bodhisattva should turn away from the taking of life after careful consideration. This is the precept that is to be observed, which has the nature of abandoning the five actions that are well known from the scriptures on discipline and so forth.
